snippet: Lawyers said a special court issued arrest warrants in the treason case against the former leader Pervez Musharraf and directed him to appear in court to be formally charged.
abstract: Special Pakistani court rejects a request by former military ruler Pervez Musharraf to leave Pakistan for medical treatment and instead issues arrest warrants in the treason case against him.
lead_paragraph: Lawyers said a special court issued arrest warrants in the treason case against the former leader Pervez Musharraf and directed him to appear in court to be formally charged.

headline.main: Musharraf’s Request to Leave Pakistan for Treatment Is Rejected
headline.print_headline: Musharraf’s Request to Leave Pakistan for Treatment Is Rejected
